author: arizzi
body:
New version of  track covariance for MiniAOD based on meanvalues, compression ranges and compression methods specified in versionable root file from DataFormats/PatCandidates/data while event by event only the id of the method. (developments from @gmandorl)

The expected size change depends on PU. It should zero or slightly negative on noPU and the increase should be below 1Kb/ev on relval ttbar w/ PU
@gpetruc
